    LoggingCache
    An object that records objects as they come into the class, keeps a portion of those objects in memory, and recovers itself when asked.
    LoggingCache.CopyMessagesResult
     
    LoggingList
    A list that saves its elements to a logfile
    LoggingMap
    A map that logs all its items to a file
    LoggingSet
    A set that logs its members

    A node in the cluster
    NodeTest
     
    NodeThread
     
    NumberOfConnections
    A servlet that returns the number of connections that the node currently has to other nodes.
    NumberOfMessages
    A servlet that returns the number of messages in the message log.
    Properties
    An enum that represents the properties that a class can listen to for changes.
    Properties
    A servlet that gathers up the system properties and ships them off as a JSON object.
    PropertiesHolder
    A class that manages some properties and notifies classes of changes to those properties.
    PropertiesHolderTest
     
    PropertyChangedEvent
    A class that is past to a PropertyListen
    PropertyListener
    A listener for property changes.
    SaveProperties
    A servlet that saves any new values from the properties page To avoid unpredictable results, the request is assumed to contain a table whose row adhere to a certain form: that is <property name><property value> where the property name must be identical to those used by the properties page.
    SaveServletTest
     
    ServerChannelToNodeDecoder
    This class takes care of a node connecting to us
    SpecNode
    A simple class that contains the specification for a node
    Status
    A servlet that returns all the info that the status page needs as one big table.
    StringEncoder
    A class that views messages as a 4 byte number that indicates the length of the string and then the string.
